storyInfo: The Confessarii raid the safe house Kal'tsit and the others are sheltering in, and reveal their true objective: to seize The King of Sarkaz's power for all eternity. In the end, they manage to take Nightingale away. Elsewhere, Talulah discovers the long-lived Nowell hidden within her team.

attributes.text: The myriad souls lie prostrate.
\nHowling knocks on the door from beneath, tangible usurps the intangible.
\nQui'sartuštaj bears witness.
\nThe Black Crown imprisoned, the offender perpetually innocent.
\nBecause kings are born before immortality.

attributes.content: Is W back yet?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: The time she's spent on this mission has already exceeded our worst-case calculations.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: How's Nightingale doing?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.text: Shining looks past the window and at Nightingale, sleeping soundly under the trees outside.

attributes.content: Not great.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Liz has never been more stable than she is right now, but the amount of Originium in her body is rising, and it's highly likely her nociceptors will be affected.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: This can't be an ordinary Infection symptom.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Perhaps it's due to the Sarkaz witchcraft devices on the battlefield, or maybe the whispering of the revenant... I don't know.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: There's no way I can tell Liz that 'I feel her pain'. For I have no idea what's going on.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: But yesterday, she was happily telling me how she hasn't been feeling any pain in her dreams for a long time now...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You're hesitating.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You've been like this ever since you returned from the Confessarius's place alone.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Do you remember what you told me, when you applied to come with me to Londinium?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: To 'heal Liz', Dr. Kal'tsit. This goal I've never wavered on, ever.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: We may not know the exact status of her illness, but we all know what it means to 'heal' her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The things we need to do will not change... on this I'm clear.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I have faith in you both.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The way you look at Nightingale isn't just with compassion. You're not just her doctor—she's healing your fears too.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Her body has its issues, but she's a member of the 'Followers', as well as your companion, and not a delicate flower that needs your protection.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Confessarii secret is truly a sickening affair, but we might only be able to uncover the truth by facing the abomination lurking in the utmost depths head on.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I know you may be somewhat worried.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But as I said when we first agreed to work together, Rhodes Island will help you if you ever need a hand.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ——Thank you, Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.text: A blue fowlbeast chirps as it lands on Shining's shoulder.
\nThis is Liz's usual way of greeting her.

attributes.content: Liz's awake. I'll go fetch her.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I'm fine, Shining. You don't have to look after me so meticulously.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Liz, we were just discussing your condition, and there are some signs... that aren't too great.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: The vicinity of Londinium has turned into a warzone, and there are some things that are affecting your health.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit and I are currently discussing our next course of action. This place is also just a temporary foothold.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Shining... come here. Closer.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Look at you. Why wear that face when you've already made up your mind?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: We can't run forever.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: The way things are now, we might as well confront them with our dignity intact, right?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: I know you'll stay with me, so I'd rather stay here, and be a little more proactive.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Liz...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Be strong, Shining. Your brows have been knitted ever since you met with them. Are you nervous?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Oh, right. While I was napping under the tree earlier... I had a dream.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: I think we were children, walking in a stream...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: The water didn't even reach our calves. It was cold, but very pleasant. We didn't speak, only walking along quietly.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: And then I woke up. I saw a strange fowlbeast pecking at its own plumage.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: It seemed to be pecking at its bruise-covered body until it was entirely covered in blood...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: It gazed at me with a pleading look in its eyes, crying as it huddled in its own nest, but it was not liquid pouring down its face, it was white wax...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Even its mess of feathers were all frozen, and it was still chirping before it died—
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.text: Qui'sartuštaj bears witness.

attributes.content: It was a strange melody, that sounded like...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.text: Qui'sartuštaj bears witness.

attributes.content: *Ancient Sarkaz Language*.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Liz...?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.text: Shining spots a black fowlbeast resting on the tree, weakly nesting on a crown made of dead branches.
\nIt looks back at Shining, and a trembling cry resounds from its syrinx, a rhythm permeating—
*Ancient Sarkaz Language*.
A black feather floats from the crown of dead branches.
\nIt covers everyone's vision despite its tiny size.

attributes.content: You led me here.
And so I've come to take you home, Liz.
Mon3tr!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (High-pitched braying)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Return from whence you came.
The structure is so fragile. It seems Theresis's blade is sharper than I imagined.
Watch out, Shining!
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: It's fine, Liz. He can't harm me.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You've regressed.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: It will be a challenge to return your body to its peak condition. That will eat into my experimentation time.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: To think you'd willingly leave that sordid lair of yours...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.text: The black fowlbeast rests on the dead branches in the Confessarius's hand.
\nIts robust body is covered by an abundance of feathers, shining with luster.
\nIt was reborn so easily and instantly from corruption.

attributes.content: It seems like you're anxious about something as well.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: We have already arrived at the gate.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: We've made great strides in our experiments, even just knocking softly on the door.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: You must attend the final ritual—
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Mon3tr, meltdown!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Angry howling)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Five minutes will be enough, Salus. Stop her with your life.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Do not let them hinder me.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.text: A black curtain of satin drapes down.
\nIt binds the howling monster in multiple layers, giving it less and less space to struggle.

attributes.content: (Pained howling)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Her Arts are black...?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Is that... Amiya's? What have you done to her?!
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: They didn't defeat her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I should have been able to present the King of Sarkaz to the leader unharmed. It's a pity.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: But no matter. Even just getting a glimpse can let the fake take another step forward.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: So, little creature. Don't disturb our leader at work—follow me elsewhere to wait till he's done!
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: (Angry wailing)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Mon3tr!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, you're in no shape to exert yourself.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I said last time that our next meeting would be on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Oh? Then why are you concealing your sword even now?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: You swore to sever your ties with our lineage when you left home, and this whole time I've been looking forward for you to return and fulfil your promise.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: I gave you time, but you disappoint me again and again.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: We were supposed to produce the next me. We would have created the most intangible bloodline in the last hundred years.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Ugh...!
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Sharp, but so impure. What's happened to your soul?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Did you think you still had hope to cling onto, after leaving us?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Liz!
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Come back!
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I won't...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Let you manipulate me!
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Oh...? You're a creation that has surpassed my expectations.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: You're supposed to be just a shell, and yet you can touch 'me'?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Now, Shining!
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: I... I can't hold on much longer!
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.text: A strange feeling surges from within Shining.
\nNightingale is resisting the Confessarius, and even suppressing him—the ancient devil's soul has never manifested in such a vulnerable state before.
Bloodline. The word itself sounds unreal, but at this moment there only seems to be an extensive crack of blood right in front of her eyes.
\nBut Shining hesitates.
Why is this so simple?
\nHow could it be this simple?

attributes.content: Nightingale, stop!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's a trap! He's waiting for your Arts to resonate!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.text: Time slows down.
\nMon3tr fights with Salus as Kal'tsit yells out. Everything flows past like streams of light.

attributes.content: Both you and I know where fate will lead us, but those without self-awareness will only trap themselves in their own pitiful cage.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: It's futile to despise your bloodline and resist your fate. No one can deny the natural gifts bestowed by our bloodline.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: I will do for you what you're hesitating to do, to crack an opening in the cage... Enter it with me, and I will bring you back onto the right track.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Think it through before you make your choice...
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: *Ancient Sarkaz name*.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.text: A white sword pierces though a heart atop a stone platform covered with dead branches.
\nShining remembers the first time she cried, she remembers just how amazing it was, the birth of an unexpected emotion.
\nA brand new soul is carved anew under the blade.

attributes.content: I've seen... pain... your... tears...
Accidents are bound to bring surprises. You could have stopped your explorations here and now, but you just can't bear to destroy the ignorant consciousness in that hollow shell.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: And so you sew memories into the empty husk instead.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: She's Liz. She shouldn't...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You did this of your own free will, filled up this consciousness with a name, with 'Liz'.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.text: 'Liz' is afraid of the completely silent person sitting across from her at the long table.
\nThey agreed to sit here every night at the same hour for dinner together.
\nBut the white-horned Sarkaz opposite her with a sword in her hands no longer speaks or moves outside of recording her every action she can remember today.
'Liz' always asks herself, have I done something to upset her?
\n'Liz' misses the beautiful memories, of how their lives were before...

attributes.content: I keep having the same dream every day. I dream of us as children, walking in a stream hand in hand...
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: Then I flew upwards, and kept going higher and higher. You couldn't hold me back, and I saw you crying from the clouds.
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: Every time, when I wish to return to your side, I always wake up in pain.
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: I ache from your suffering, and I want to bear it for you.
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: I just need you to tell me why you feel like this...
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: Qui'saršinnag.
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: Qui'saršinnag. This name means 'inseparable hope'—our destiny.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Poor 'Liz'. She think it's all her fault, because of the momentary kindness you showed her.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: I've already abandoned that sinful name. I'm called Shining now, and will always be.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Is that so? Are you sure you can resist your family's destiny that has carried on for a millennium?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: I'm looking forward to it.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.text: 'Liz' holds the blue fowlbeast rescued from the river in her hands.
\nThe indigo feathers are trembling, and the cold river water makes her shiver.
She thought Qui'saršinnag would get angry at her, but the sorrowful Sarkaz merely weaves a brand new birdcage for 'Liz'.
\n'Put it inside, and it'll stay safe always.'

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Qui'saršinnag. I didn't mean to endanger myself by going into the river to save it...
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: But I just couldn't watch it die.
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: I became fond of it the moment your family gifted it to me.
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: It likes to fly freely, but once it gets too far away from me it seems to lose its life, and falls into the river...
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: You say I did something similar yesterday... but I have no recollection of that at all.
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: But I'll listen to you, and put it inside the cage. I'll keep it safe.
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: Please don't get angry. I promise you something so foolish as this won't ever happen again.
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: The cage has finally accepted their own duty, and you have also realized your own destiny.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: The more fragments and lies you fill her up with, the more confusion and suffering she goes through.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: I've lifted those dusty fragments for her. There's no undoing her awakening, and eventually, she will suffer as her rootless consciousness crumbles.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: I won't let that happen, Father.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I'll end our sins with my own hands, and Liz will be 'cured'.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: And what next? Isn't her regaining the truth the very thing you fear, my dear sister?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: This is the source of your woeful hesitation.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: I tolerate you wandering around with this receptacle, continuously strengthening this fragile cage...
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Because I trust you to cherish it with your all, and you never disappoint me.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Eventually you'll come back to my side with the cage in tow.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: That's what you've done. Look, She even tried to cage me in, to create an opportunity for you to defeat me.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Your rebellious love for her, and her fate resisting conscience have sadly only become another catalyst together.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: —Even want to use the hope she found herself?!
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Shining? Are you here?
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: I can sense your breathing, but I can't see you...
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: I'm here, Liz!
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: She can't hear your voice. We're walking within her tattered consciousness—
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: —Inside the cage.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.text: Shining sees the blue fowlbeast, huge enough to fill her vision.
\nGiant gray eyes look down on her, she is unable to see herself reflected in those eyes.
\nThe fowlbeast's sharp beak opens and closes, a mellow voice trails in from nowhere.

attributes.content: Shining... there's a vague question echoing in my head together with a name that stings me, but I can't recall it at all...
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: I might be able to remember it after we leave this place.
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: I've found I can share the pains of others and slow down their lives withering away.
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: You said we'd go to faraway places to find a way to cure me, and maybe I can cure others in pain along the way too.
attributes.name: Liz?

attributes.content: She's submerged in those disorderly and fragmented memories, and will eventually lose herself in them.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Or perhaps she'll go mad, or maybe she'll end her own life before that happens.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: But you know how to solve this, Qui'saršinnag. I've taught you.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Draw your sword, and cut down your blood relatives here and now.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Our souls will reconnect with your sword as a bridge, and you—
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Will give birth.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: To ancient power.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: This is your inescapable destiny.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Become one with me, and use the remains of your bloodkin to nourish her consciousness that will stay shattered otherwise.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Forgive me, Liz.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.text: Shining clutches the sword in her arms, and the Confessarius's hand is already pressing on the scabbard.

attributes.content: At last, Qui'saršinnag...
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.text: Day and night are about to pour out from the sheath.
\nBut a single hand holds onto Shining's sleeve.

attributes.content: Shining. I like your new name much better.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Liz...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I feel like I've slept for a long time, lost myself within an infinity of fragments.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: But I heard your voice, and you guided me to a place buried underneath the countless fragments.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: I dug up some of my splintered memories there... and I still haven't remembered them all.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: But I've recalled the question that I should have given you my answer to long ago...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: I forgave you long ago.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Even before you resolved to seal all the memories of that laboratory away...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: So I'm angry with you for deciding to act on your own without asking me.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: 'Liz'. I've always loved the name you chose for me.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Don't run away and bear everything by yourself. Didn't we promise to face it all together—
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.text: Shining sees Nightingale's eyes, and her smile.
\nWhen she comes back to her senses, the hand has already quietly slipped away from her sleeve.

attributes.content: A tragedy we have here, but the ending has already been determined.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: You killing me will turn you into the breeding ground for the next in our bloodline, or, you can look on helplessly as you watch me take her away and drown in your regrets after.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: It's all the same, Sister.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Sir, we need to retreat!
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Ugh!
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: How many bloodlines have you yet to touch, Chimera? Show me.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: How many times can you put blood back into your body, and tell yourself your own fate?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: (Confused growl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: (Angry howling)
attributes.name: Mon3tr?

attributes.content: (Excited cry)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Your little monster's copy is quite poor.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Is this because you're not as strong as you were before your rebirth, or is Dame Kal'tsit, beloved of all tribes, even more injured than I thought?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: (Disdainful roar)
attributes.name: Mon3tr?

attributes.content: Qui'sartuštaj. The other part has chosen you.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: So what will you bring him?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: The name 'Qui'sartuštaj' itself is the answer.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: (In ancient Sarkaz) 'Inextinguishable hope'.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Qui'saršinnag. The cage is already awake. If you continue to keep her by your side, she will only... like the dewdrops of early dawn, evaporate and fade away in the light.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: I will take her away, and I will help you maintain her, I will help you make amends—
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: I will forge this cage into a crown.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: And then, you will, we will be—
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: The King of Sarkaz for all eternity.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: There's no point in chasing after him.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Take stock of our losses and prepare to move at once. We still have unstabilized wounded, but our cover here has already been blown.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Operator Nightingale is an employee of the Rhodes Island Medical Department, and we will not allow anyone to take her away or to do her harm.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But we might place her in greater danger if we make any rash moves. After all, we're facing an immortal 'Lord of Fiends' that has been coveting the crown for thousands of years.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Qui'sartuštaj. The one who knocks on the door, the King of Usurping Kings.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I knew the threat of the Confessarii since the days of Babel, even though my numerous countermeasure attempts were all in vain.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Theresis concealed them so well that everyone merely thought of them as the regent's guards.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Please be at ease. I know what we have to do now.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I thought you'd be less calm than this.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: What's your plan?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Liz... She has made her own choice.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: A choice even I had never dared to think of, daring, aggressive, and also the most effective method. It seems like the one afraid of loss and death has always been me...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: What I need to do. Heh.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Is to catch up to her.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: ...I believe in you both.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: How's Amiya, Ascalon?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She and the Doctor were also beset by the Confessarii's surprise attack, and are now with Logos.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Amiya has been affected by some kind of witchcraft. The one who they call Salus tried to seize the King of Sarkaz's power from her directly and failed, but Amiya's current condition is... very strange.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: She's fallen into a coma.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Amiya's connection with the 'Lord of Fiends' is only growing stronger, so we can only place our faith in her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We also discovered several of the Vampires' Arts Circles, accompanied by some 'illusions' from history.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: The Doctor mentioned that the Originium used to build these Arts Circles was very 'special'.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: 'Special'.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Well then, Lord Damazti, I thank you for your assistance. What do you seek from us?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We seek change. To hone ourselves. And meaning.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: We seek the meaning of living a long and disordered life. You will show it to us, and we will verify it.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: ...That's all.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Tell Closure and Feist to sweep this place thoroughly. We'll leave in three hours.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Leave a message for W to head towards Brentwood as per our original plans.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We... really have to hurry.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hey! Uncle Nowell! The lens in my glasses fell out again!
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: *Sigh*
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: I told you so many times your ears are too soft.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: You grip on the frames so hard every time you feel your glasses sliding down that you break and change their shape. So of course the lens won't stay in place.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: Let me have a look.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: It's because you gave me such a heavy pair to wear!
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: But I found a better method, look!
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.text: Little Susanna pulls out two leaves from behind her, and wedges the stems on her ears with the tips resting on her nose bridge.
\nAh, glasses of green, fashioned with leaves.

attributes.content: Ta-da! What'd you think?
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: Can you see with them?
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: I can! Really!
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: Just face the sun, like this—
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.text: The child goes over to Nowell and puts two leaves on his eyes.
\nNowell's vision is filled with a verdant green.

attributes.content: Alright, kid, you—
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: Just look!
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.text: Leaf veins.
\nThe sunlight at noon in the forest is not very strong, but it is enough to shine through the thin leaves and reveal their interlaced veins, clear for all to see.

attributes.content: How is it? You can see, right?
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: You won't see anything interesting with that frown always on your face, Uncle Nowell!
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.text: He stares blankly at the sun with the leaves covering his eyes.

attributes.content: ...I can't see anything at all.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: But, I know of a story from Yan of the east, a tale of 'missing the forest for the leaves'—
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: Nuh-uh, not listening! You're as boring as ever, Uncle Nowell!
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.text: The child with the glasses made of leaves comes and goes like a breeze, and disappears into the distant camp in the blink of an eye.

attributes.content: It seems like you don't get along with the children, Mr. Nowell.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: If it isn't Talulah. Done with work?
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: I told that story to my son once... however, he didn't like hearing my stories either. Maybe I'm just not suited for it.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: You have an abundance of experience, even if we only know it from a smattering of phrases.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: An average downtrodden Victorian optometrist who fled here after his shop was taken away from him amidst the war.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: He sympathized with the Infected who were being discriminated against, and so chose to join their group and help out a little with his abilities.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You've always displayed a respectable character ever since I got to know you, Mr. Nowell.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But it's because of that... I...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Please speak your mind, Talulah.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: I'm just curious why a long-lived like you would deign to conceal your identity and do such insignificant things.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I noticed. Of course, this is still much better than the worst-case scenario I thought of.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: However... you can deny it, and we'll speak of it no more. I'll tell Nine though.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I won't.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.text: Nowell smiles, plucks a leaf and fiddles with it.

attributes.content: There are actually many Victorians who I'm well-acquainted with, that know my identity... I only wish to avoid scaring my travel companions.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: But I'd like to correct you on one point, Talulah. I'm not 'deigning' to act like this.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: My longevity aside, I doubt I'm any more talented than ordinary people.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: The long-lived gain their longevity through different means, as diverse as the Originium Arts they use.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: But we aren't always influential figures, Talulah.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: In fact... I'm much more interested in your story.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: A descendant of the red dragon, founder of Reunion, and the leader of the Infected movement that took off in Ursus. To think you'd still act so shrewdly towards a so-called 'long-lived'?
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: ...Who exactly are you, Mr. Nowell?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Just some guy.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: A hundred and fifty years ago, I was telling my third son the fables I learned from my travels in Yan, and he left my side from impatience.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: And as I stood before his granddaughter's granddaughter, I was once again a stranger in a large family.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: So now I harbor anger and pain inside me, giving up entirely on both family and love as I try to locate the villain hiding in Victoria who manipulated my fate.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: I spent the last century researching... researching the ''long-liveds', the 'gods', the 'masterminds', the 'immemorials', and myself.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: I tried to benefit from the system of nobility, to hone my Originium Arts, to accumulate wealth and exchange it for secrets...
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: I tried every method you can fathom to get closer to the truth, but I haven't been successful at all.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: I didn't manage to become nobility or wealthy. I only had a little shop... that's all I really had. Combat abilities wise, I might not even be able to defeat Mr. Guard.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: Time has only taught me to recognize the reality that I hold no talents at all.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: That's the story of an ordinary person, Talulah. This tale I can freely share with you.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.text: Nowell drops the leaves that were in his hand, and the breeze blows them far away.
\nHe dusts himself off, and picks up his suitcase once more.

attributes.content: Please, rest assured I hold no ill intent towards you all. I only wish to find... the 'hands of fate' that cursed me.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: She hides behind the country, treating her monarch as her glove, and the city-state her chessboard.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: She merely looks upon everything labeled 'Victoria' with a cold gaze. If needed, 'Victoria' can even be destroyed and rebuilt, and topped off with a new flag after.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: How can I believe she isn't involved in our current turmoil of absurdity?
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: She's definitely hiding within the dukes. Watching the Sarkaz and Victorians engage in mutual slaughter. Bloodshed and sacrifice are merely heartless parameters and indicators to her.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: Perhaps you might have been manipulated by a similar pair of 'hands' before—you have royal blood running through your veins after all. She has no reason to let you nor Alistair's daughter go.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: Me? I do know another conspirator, but he doesn't deserve to be called a god, nor can he manipulate my fate.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But that's exactly how they live on, Talulah.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: I want to know how to kill them.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: Or perhaps, how to kill myself.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: It's getting late, I need to fix little Susanna's glasses.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: Mr. Nowell, you...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Talulah. The reason why I willingly tell you all of this, and why I joined Reunion—do forgive my selfishness—it is due to the intuition I've honed by the extra century I've lived.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: You too, have resisted such a predetermined fate.
attributes.name: Nowell

attributes.content: All of you here have.
attributes.name: Nowell
